pullRequest.title: Refactor value based segment pruner to work on DataSource instead of ColumnMetadata
pullRequest.bodyText:
Motivation:
ColumnMetadata is avaliable to immutable segments only. This change will make segment pruner work on mutable segments.
Changes:

Merge PartitionSegmentPruner into ColumnValueSegmentPruner to reduce the overhead of segment pruning
Re-order segment pruners (ValidSegment -> DataSchema -> ColumnValue)

nodes.bodyText:
It would be nice if this javadoc can be enhanced to highlight what all pruning is done. Something like..
(1) use equality filter value for partition pruning (if table is partitioned)
(2) use equality filter for bloom filter based pruning
(2) min-max value based pruner for RANGE
